Celebrate our 10th anniversary with us

For 10 years, Flying Blue has been the ideal travelling companion allowing you to earn Miles and exchange them for flight tickets, hotel stays, car rental and more. Discover the 10 years of your programme in a few key figures.

Get inspired for spending your Miles!

Promo Awards

10th Anniversary Promo Awards Save 50% on your Award Miles

Flying Blue celebrates its 10th Anniversary with special Promo Awards. Save no less than 50% on your Award Miles on selected destinations! The sales period will be only between 1 and 10 December 2015 (10 days).
Book now
Flying Blue Store

Flying Blue Store - celebration time! Miles discounts

Check out our Flying Blue Store with perfect gifts for everybody! Choose from a wide selection of premium brands and more than 300 different products. To celebrate our 10th anniversary, Flying Blue Store has a lot of great deals in store for you!
Visit store
Flying Blue Store

Bose Noise Cancelling Headphone Limited Edition

Headphones on. World off. Our partner Bose offers all Noise Cancelling headphones for only 89.985 Miles - exclusively for Flying Blue members! Be quick because this offer is limited and only valid until 31 December 2015.
Visit store
Flying Blue Store

Sony Electronics - exclusive offers Mega deals!

Smile to the Sony Compact Camera, it is our birthday! For only 94.004 Miles. You can find this offer and many more in our Flying Blue Store: specially selected products, also suitable for a smaller Miles balance!

Points

Buy the extra Award Miles you need 50% extra Award Miles

Until 30 November 2015, you will earn 50% extra Miles when you buy Award Miles. Just a few Miles short of that award (ticket) you’ve been saving up for? You can buy the Award Miles you need and book your award (ticket) right away. Award Miles can be purchased in units of 2,000.

Earn up to 10,000 Award Miles on your hotel stays with PointsHound. The low-price guarantee makes sure you get the best deal possible. Even better, all first-time bookings will earn 2,000 extra Award Miles if you book before 31 December 2015.
